Spoofing.title: Multi-factor Authentication
Spoofing.description: Implement additional authentication factors beyond passwords
Spoofing.implementation: Add a second authentication factor such as SMS, email codes, or authenticator apps

Spoofing.title: Strong Authentication Policies
Spoofing.description: Enforce strong password requirements and regular rotation
Spoofing.implementation: Configure password policies with complexity requirements and account lockout

Spoofing.title: Certificate-based Authentication
Spoofing.description: Use digital certificates for identity verification
Spoofing.implementation: Implement mutual TLS authentication for critical services

Tampering.title: Input Validation
Tampering.description: Validate all input before processing to prevent injection attacks
Tampering.implementation: Implement server-side validation with strong typing and sanitization

Tampering.title: Digital Signatures
Tampering.description: Use cryptographic signatures to verify data integrity
Tampering.implementation: Sign critical data and verify signatures before processing

Tampering.title: Access Control
Tampering.description: Implement proper access controls for modifying data
Tampering.implementation: Use role-based access control and validate permissions for all data changes

Repudiation.title: Secure Logging
Repudiation.implementation: Log all security-relevant events with timestamps, user IDs, and actions

Repudiation.title: Digital Signatures
Repudiation.implementation: Require signing of critical actions and verify signatures

Repudiation.title: Audit Trails
Repudiation.description: Maintain complete audit trails of user actions
Repudiation.implementation: Implement audit logging that cannot be disabled by regular users

Information Disclosure.title: Data Encryption
Information Disclosure.description: Encrypt sensitive data at rest and in transit
Information Disclosure.implementation: Use TLS for transit encryption and field-level encryption for sensitive database columns

Information Disclosure.title: Access Control
Information Disclosure.description: Implement proper access controls for sensitive data
Information Disclosure.implementation: Use role-based access control and principle of least privilege

Information Disclosure.title: Data Minimization
Information Disclosure.description: Collect and expose only necessary data
Information Disclosure.implementation: Review data handling practices and eliminate collection of unnecessary sensitive data

Denial of Service.title: Rate Limiting
Denial of Service.description: Limit the rate of requests from users/IPs
Denial of Service.implementation: Implement API rate limiting and connection throttling

Denial of Service.title: Resource Quotas
Denial of Service.implementation: Implement memory/CPU limits and timeouts for operations

Elevation of Privilege.title: Principle of Least Privilege
Elevation of Privilege.description: Provide minimal access rights needed for functionality
Elevation of Privilege.implementation: Use role-based access control and verify authorization on each request

Elevation of Privilege.title: Input Validation
Elevation of Privilege.description: Validate all inputs to prevent injection attacks
Elevation of Privilege.implementation: Implement strict validation for parameters that control access

Elevation of Privilege.title: Security Headers
Elevation of Privilege.description: Implement security headers to prevent client-side attacks

default.title: Security Review
default.description: Conduct thorough security review of the component
default.implementation: Perform code review and penetration testing
